# Content Validation Checklist

Based on contracts/document-structure.yaml and constitutional requirements.

## Document Structure Compliance

- [ ] Executive Summary: ≤500 words, meaningful content
- [ ] Vision Statement: ≤50 words, aspirational  
- [ ] Mission Statement: ≤100 words, purpose-driven
- [ ] Organizational Values: ≤7 values, name + description
- [ ] Strategic Context: ≤800 words, comprehensive sections

## Constitutional Compliance

- [ ] Documentation Excellence: Clear purpose, professional quality
- [ ] Markdown Standardization: Proper formatting, no lint errors
- [ ] Review Process: Version tracking, dates, ownership
- [ ] Best Practices: Accessibility, quality standards
- [ ] Comprehensive Coverage: All required sections complete

## Quality Validation

- [ ] Content accuracy and consistency
- [ ] Grammar and spelling review
- [ ] Stakeholder review completed
- [ ] Technical formatting verified
- [ ] Final approval documented

**Status**: ⏳ Pending Content Completion
